tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I was diagnosed with osteomyelitis in my right tibea one year ago. After consulting various doctors and even after undergoing a surgery the condition was not improved.
After consulting  Dr. Senthil kamalasekaran I got a hope.
He analysed the wound and the surgery was done successfully. The pus was removed and antibiotic beads was filled inside the bone. Now the wound has healed.
Dr.Senthil is very caring *** ******* ********* *** *********** **********  ***** ********** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had an issue with Right Shoulder pain due to bone spur last 2 years, it was a regular pain not being able to work on a laptop, sleepless nights, and difficulty driving a car. Went for Consultation As per Dr. Senthil Sir suggestion I underwent arthroscopic surgery in Apollo Hospital OMR - Discharged after 2 days. Post Surgery did Physiotherapy exercises, i started all normal activities within a week. now i completely alright.
Thanks to Dr. Senthil Kamalasekaran Sir.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Senthil is an empathetic and experienced doctor. We consulted him for the fracture of the greater trochanter of femur bone, of my 86 year old grandfather. His expertise and reassurance gave us the confidence to proceed with the surgery. The surgery was done at Apollo spectra hospital, MRC Nagar. The surgery went extremely well and the recovery was sooner than we expected. His constant guidance and care post surgery helped in nurturing my grandfather back to good health.
